st: Bahut Ho Chuka Intezaar Unka,
s:
Bahut Ho Chuka Intezaar Unka,
Ab Aur Zakham Sahe Jaate Nahi,

Kya Bayaan Karein Unke Sitam Ko,
Dard Unke Kahe Jate Nahi…

st: Bhale Hi Raah Chalton Ka Daaman Tham Le,
s:
Bhale Hi Raah Chalton Ka Daaman Tham Le,
Magar Mere Pyar Ko Bhi Tu Pahchan Le,

Kitna Intezaar Kiya Hai Tere Ishq Mein,
Jara Yeh Dill Ki Betaabi Tu Jaan Le..

st: Kitne Sapne Dil Mein Sajaye Tere Liye,
s:
Kitne Sapne Dil Mein Sajaye Tere Liye,
Raahon Me Phool Bichhaye Tere Liye,

Aati Hai Koi Yaad Teri Chupke Se,
Har Dastak Pe Bah’r Aaye Tere Liye,

Jhooti Lagti Hai Har Kahaani Duniya Ki,
Mohabbat Sacchi Nazar Aaye Tere Liye,

Likhe Rakhe Hai Jo Khat Haath Ke,
Harf-Dar-Harf Dard Badhaye Tere Liye,

Intezar Ki Ab Toh Intahaa Ho Gai Hai,
Kitna Aankhon Ko Ruulaye Tere Liye,

Mitti Ka Khilona Ban Gaya Hai,
Bas Tuut Ke Judhna Aa Jaye Tere Liye…

st: Zindagi Se Sabhi Ko Mohabbat Hai,
s:
Zindagi Se Sabhi Ko Mohabbat Hai,
Par Zindagi Kisi Ki Mohabbat Nahi Banti,
Tamanna Le Kar Jeete Hai Sab Log,
Magar Har Tamanna Taqdeer Nahi Banti…

st: Zindagi Hasin Hai Zindagi Se Pyaar Karo,
s:
Zindagi Hasin Hai Zindagi Se Pyaar Karo,
Hai Rat To Subah Ka Intzar Karo,
Wo Pal Bhi Ayega Jiska Intzaar Hai Aap Ko,
Rab Pr Bhrosa Or Waqt Pe Aitbar Rakho…

st: Kaun Kehta Hai Ishq Me Bas Ikraar Hota Hai
s:
Kaun Kehta Hai Ishq Me Bas Ikraar Hota Hai
Kaun Kehta Hai Ishq Me Bas Inkaar Hota Hai,
Tanhai Ko Tum Bebasi Ka Naam Na Do,
Kyunki Ishq Ka Doosra Naam Hi Intezaar Hota Hai…

st: Mere Marne Ke Baad Meri Kahani Likhna,
s:
Mere Marne Ke Baad Meri Kahani Likhna,
Kaise Barbaad Huwi Meri Jawani Likhna,

Aur Likhna Ki Mere Honth Khushi Ko Tarse,
Kaise Barsa Meri Aankhoon Se Paani Likhna,

Aur Likhna Ki Uska Intezaar To Bahut Tha,
Aakhri Saansoon Mein Woh Hichkiyoun Ki Rawaani Likhna,

Likhna Ke Marte Waqt Bhi Deta Tha Dua Tujhko,
Haath Bahar Tha Qafan Se Yehi Nishaani Likhna…

st: Is Nazar Ko Tera Intezaar Rehta Hai
s:
Is Nazar Ko Tera Intezaar Rehta Hai
Dil Tumse Milne Ko Beqaraar Hota Hai
Tum Hamse Milo Na Milo
Phir Bhi is Dil Main Teri Dosti Ka Pyar Rehta Hai…

st: Gahraai Ka Shok Kise Hai,
s:
Gahraai Ka Shok Kise Hai,
Hum To Kinaare Par Hi Rahte Hain,

Kisi Galti Ka Aham Nahi Mujhe,
Kisi Ke Sahaare Hi Rahte Hain,

Teri Qaaynaat Mein Thodi Jagah De Ah Khuda,
Intezaar, Tere Ishaare Par Hi Rahte Hai….

st: Jubaa Agar Ashkon Ki Samjho Toh,
s:
Jubaa Agar Ashkon Ki Samjho Toh,
Yeh Sab Kuchh Kah Jaate Hain Yaaro,
Dil Ke Bojh Ko Karte Hain Halka,
Khud Sabke Gham Sah Jaate Hain Yaaro…

st: Rooth Jaye Agar Koi Toh Mana Lo,
s:
Rooth Jaye Agar Koi Toh Mana Lo,
Tutne Na Do Ghar Apna Basa Lo,
Agar Dushman Bhi Mile Raah Mein Kabhi,
Toh Usko Bhi Yaar Gale Laga Lo…

st: Eh Mout Thahar Ja Tu Jara,
s:
Eh Mout Thahar Ja Tu Jara,
Yaar Ka Intezaar Hai Mujhko,
Aayega Woh Jarur Aaj Agar,
Us Se Sacha Pyar Hai Mujhko…

st: Eh Mout Jara Thahar Ja, Jara Sa Ruk Ja Tu,
s:
Eh Mout Jara Thahar Ja, Jara Sa Ruk Ja Tu,
Intezaar Hai Unka, Jinki Amanat Hai Zindagi,

Jara Unse Rukhsat Le Lene De, Fir Le Chalna,
Yeh Jaruri Hai, Unhi Ki Badolat Hai Zindagi…

st: Dost Aapko Humse Bhi Achhe Mil Jaayenge,
s:
Dost Aapko Humse Bhi Achhe Mil Jaayenge,
Aap Humko Dost Banakar Kya Karoge,

Aapka Toh Intezaar Kar Rahi Hain Khusiyan,
Aap Sagar Ke Ghamon Ko Apnakar Kya Karoge…

st: Bas Aur Do Kadam Mere Saath Chalna Yaaro,
s:
Bas Aur Do Kadam Mere Saath Chalna Yaaro,
Us Se Aage Main Khud Tumse Bichhud Jaaunga,

Aage Intezaar Kar Rahi Hai Mahbooba Mout Meri,
Uske Saath Main Khud Tumse Aage Nikal Jaaunga…

st: Taron ki chilmano se koi jhankata bhi ho
s:
Taron ki chilmano se koi jhankata bhi ho
Is kaynat mein koi manjhar naya bhi ho,

Itni shyah raat mein kisko sadayen du
Aisa chirag de jo kabhi bolta bhi ho,

Saare pahad katkar main milne aaunga
Han mere intezaar mein dariya ruka bhi ho,

Rango ki kya bahar hai pathar ke baag mein
Lekin meri zamee ka ek hissa hara bhi…

st: Hum jaise musafiron ka safar intezaar hai
s:
Hum jaise musafiron ka safar intezaar hai
Sabhi khidkiyon ke saamne lambi katar hai,

Vhamkili sabj aankhe bahut door ja chuki
Kin ghantiyon ka raston ko intezar hai,

Aawaj fadfada ke wahin dafan ho gayi
Seene mein shayad koi bijli ka taar hai,

Suraj kalam sar hai jamin ke sahid ka
Yeh dhoop uske jard badan ki bahar hai,

Aayi ninda woh udte sitare udhar mude
In baadliyon ke pichhe koi pahad hai…

st: Tere Libash Se Mohabbat Ki Hai,
s:
Tere Libash Se Mohabbat Ki Hai,
Tere Ehsas Se Mohabbat Ki Hai,

Tu Mere Paas Nahi Fir Bhi,
Maine Teri Yaad Se Mohabbat Ki Hai,

Kabhi Tune Bhi Mujhe Yaad Kiya Hoga,
Maine Un Lamho Se Mohabbat Ki Hai,

Jinme Ho Sirf Teri Aur Meri Baatein,
Maine Un Alfaaz Se Mohabbat Ki Hai,

Jo Mahkate Ho Teri Mohabbat Se,
Maine Un Jazbat Se Mohabbat Ki Hai,

Tujhse Milna Toh Ab 1 Khwab Lagta Hai,
Isliye Ae Dost Maine Tere Intezaar Se Mohabbat Ki Hai…

st: Bin Aapke Kuchh Bhi Achha Nahin Lagta,
s:
Bin Aapke Kuchh Bhi Achha Nahin Lagta,
Ab Mera Vajood Bhi Sacha Nahin Lagta,

Sirf Aapke Deedar Ke Intazar Mein,
Kat Rahi Hai Zindagi,

Varna Kab Ki Mout Ke Aagosh Mein,
So Jati Yeh Zindagi,

Lout Aao Ke Aapke Bagair Ek Lamha Nahin Kat Ta,
Bin Aapke Kuchh Bhi Achha Nahin Lagta…

st: Aaye Kya Duniya Mein Hum,
s:
Aaye Kya Duniya Mein Hum,
Kya Sair Ki,
Chalte Firte,
Ek Nazaara Ho Gaya,

st: Maje Vishal Ke Eh Dil,
s:
Maje Vishal Ke Eh Dil,
Khyale Yaar Mein Hai,
Khusi Ke Saath,
Sabbe Intezaar Leta Ja,

st: Aah Se Ho Saamna KyuKar,
s:
Aah Se Ho Saamna KyuKar,
Nigahe Yaar Ka,
Rokna Dushwar Hai,
Talvar Se Talvar Ka…

st: Is Bahane Se Bahaye,
s:
Is Bahane Se Bahaye,
Sre Mahfil Aansu,
Kah Diya Unse Ki,
Aankho Mein Khatak Hoti Hai,

st: Apna Sa Dusra,
s:
Apna Sa Dusra,
Najar Aane Laga Mujhe,
Jalta Hu Main,
Woh Aaina Rukhsar Kyu Huye,

st: Thak Thak Ke,
s:
Thak Thak Ke,
Band Hote Hain Chasme Intezaar,
Aata Hai Sab Ko,
Khyal Tumhare Khyal Se…

st: Aapka Eitbaar Koun Kare,
s:
Aapka Eitbaar Koun Kare,
Roj Ka Intezar Koun Kare,

Jikre Mahro Wafa Toh Karte Hain,
Par Tumhe Sharmshar Koun Kare,

Jo Ho Is Chasme Mast Se Bekhud,
Fir Use Hoshiyar Kon Kare,

Apni Tasbih Rahne De Jahid,
Dana Dana Shumar Kare,

Gair Ne Tumse Bewfayi Ki,
Yeh Chalan Ekhtiyar Kon Kare,

Daag Ki Sakal Dekh Kar Bole,
Aisi Soorat Ko Pyar Kon Kare…

st: Sagar E Ishq Mein Hai Kya Umeedo Bhay Mujhe,
s:
Sagar E Ishq Mein Hai Kya Umeedo Bhay Mujhe,
Ke Doob Doob Ke Kasti Meri Nikalati Hai,

Jhalakati Hai Sar E Shakh E Mija Se Khun Ki Bund,
Pedd Mein Pahle Phal Se Kali Nikalati Hai,

Sabbe Firak Jo Khole Hain Hamne Jakhme Jigar,
Yeh Intezaar Hai Kab Chandani Nikalati Hai,

Ghame Firak Mein Ho Daag Is Kadar Betab,
Jara Se Ranj Mein Jaan Aapki Nikalati Hai…

st: Hamein Ek Nasha Sa Hai,
s:
Hamein Ek Nasha Sa Hai,
Iske Patr Ke Intezar Ka,

Woh Bewafa Dushman Hai,
Mere Dil Ke Karar Ka,

Bahut Intezar Kiya Ikraar Ka,
Aap Khat Mein Inkaar Kar Do,

Mohabbat Na Sahi Aap,
Khat Mein Nafrat Ka Ijhaar Kar Do…

st: Mukar Jaate Hain Woh Har Baar Vada Karke Bhi,
s:
Mukar Jaate Hain Woh Har Baar Vada Karke Bhi,
Rok Lete Hain Kadam Aane Ka Irada Kar Ke Bhi,

Ab Surat Na Dekhenge Karenge Pyar Kam Yaro,
Dekh Liya Anjam Pyar Jyada Karke Bhi,

Tune Pyar Ke Badle Mein Aksar Intezar Diya,
Ikrar Ke Badle Mein Hamesha Hamein Inkar Kiya,

Main Kaise Bhul Jaaun Tere Julmo Ki Kahani Ko,
Jo Maine Tere Jhute Vaado Pe Aitbaar Kiya…

st: Achha Na Lage Yeh Jahan,
s:
Achha Na Lage Yeh Jahan,
Achhi Na Lage Yeh Zindagi,

Humne Toh Chaha Tha Dil Se,
Fir Tum Ne Kyu Ki Dillagi,

Din Hamare Dhal Gaye,
Rate Bhi Saari Gujar Gayi,

Unka Intezaar Karte Karte,
Umar Saari Gujar Gayi…

st: Gul Aur Gulzar Ki Mehak Hai Chaaron Taraf,
s:
Gul Aur Gulzar Ki Mehak Hai Chaaron Taraf,
Hum Toh Ek Kali Ke Khilne Ke Intezaar Mein Hain,

Bijli Aur Aatish Hain Roshan Chaaron Taraf,
Hum Tho Ek Jugnoo Ki Roshni Ke Intezaar Mein Hain,

Kaarvan Sajaye Chale Ja Rahe Hain Har Raah Par,
Hum Tho Ek Anjaan Rahi Ke Intezaar Mein Hain,

Kash Aaj To Aaaye Woh Humaari Chaukhat Pe,
Aankhein Bichaaye Sadiyon Se Unhi Ke Intezaar Mein Hain…

st: Tamam Raat Woh Jaagein Ya Soyein Saare Din,
s:
Tamam Raat Woh Jaagein Ya Soyein Saare Din,
Khabar Bhi Kya Unhe Kaise Kate Hamare Din,

Khuda Bachaye Kayamat Ke Hain Tumhare Din,
Yeh Pyari Pyari Jawani Yeh Pyare Pyare Din,

Mujhe Gujarti Hai Ek Ek Ghadi Intezaar Ki,
Jo Is Tarah Se Gujre To Kya Gujre Din,

Mere Dil Pe Hain Daage-Firak Roje-Firak,
Dikha Raha Hai Chamkate Huye Sitare Din…

st: Barison Ka Intezaar Tha Dil Milne Ko Bekrar Tha,
s:
Barison Ka Intezaar Tha Dil Milne Ko Bekrar Tha,
Ek Taraf Judai Ek Taraf Unka Pyar Tha,

Kuchh Ankahi Ansuni Baatein Thi Zuban Par,
Dil Mein Kuchh Sarart Bhara Khumar Tha,

Sochha Tha Jab Milenge Khub Saari Baatein Hongi,
Par Baton Ka Kya Dil Toh Pyar Ka Beemar Tha,

Woh Pyar Deta To Shayad Gham Door Ho Jaate,
Dil Chah Kar Bhi Naa Mil Paaya Unse,

Darta Tha Fir Judaa Ho Jayega,
Pal Bhar Ka Jo Deedar Tha…

st: Mila Woh Bhi Nahi Karte,
s:
Mila Woh Bhi Nahi Karte,
Mila Hum Bhi Nahin Karte,

Gila Woh Bhi Nahi Karte,
Sikwa Hum Bhi Nahi Karte,

Kisi Mod Par Takrav Ho Jata Hai Aksar,

Ruka Woh Bhi Nahi Karte,
Intezar Hum Bhi Nahi Karte…

st: Intezar Rahta Hai Har Shyam Tera,
s:
Intezar Rahta Hai Har Shyam Tera,
Raate Kat Ti Hain Le Le Ke Naam Tera,

Muddat Se Baithi Hun Yeh Aas Pale,
Shayad Ab Aa Jaye Koi Paigam Tera…

st: Armaan Tha Tere Sath Zindagi Bitane Ka,
s:
Armaan Tha Tere Sath Zindagi Bitane Ka,
Sikwa Hai Khud Ke Khamosh Rah Jaane Ka,

Diwaanagi Is Se Badhkar Aur Kya Hogi,
Aaaj Bhi Intezar Hai Tere Aane Ka…

st: Khuda Jaane Ke Ab Kyon,
s:
Khuda Jaane Ke Ab Kyon,
Hum Se Na Pyar Karti Ho,

Milakar Aankh Gairon Se,
Hamein Intezar Karwaati Ho,

Gulaam Banke Husn Ko ,
Yun Na Salaam Karo,

Kiya Hai Isq Toh Isq Ko,
Badnaam Na Karo…

st: Nazrein Meri Thak Na Jaaye,
s:
Nazrein Meri Thak Na Jaaye,
Bewafa Tera Intezar Karte Karte,

Yeh Jaan Yun Hi Nikal Na Jaaye,
Tum Se Isq Ka Izhaar Karte Karte,

Jahaan Waale Dekhte Hain Ghur Ghur Kar,
Ke Hamein Yeh Kya Beemari Ho Gayi Hai…

st: Kya Dosti Hai Hamaari,
s:
Kya Dosti Hai Hamaari,

Jo Main Tumpe Marta Hun,

Har Samay Tere Aane Ka,

Intezaar Karta Hun,

Naa Koi Gilla Hai Tumse,

Isiliye Toh Main Har Roj,

Tumhare Liye Khuda Se Dua Karta Hun…

st: Zakhm Itna Gahra Hai Izhaar Kya Karein
s:
Zakhm Itna Gahra Hai Izhaar Kya Karein
Hum Khud Nishaana Ban Gaye Vaar Kya Karein

So Gaye Hum Magar Khuli Rahi Aankhen
Is Se Zyada Unka Intzaar Kya Kare…

st: Unhein Hameshaa Main Chaahta Hi Rahunga,
s:
Unhein Hameshaa Main Chaahta Hi Rahunga,
Unka Naam Lekar Yeh Zindagi Gujaarta Hi Rahunga,

Khata Ho Duniya Ki Nazron Mein Toh Khata Hi Sahi,
Ye Khata Main Karta Hi Rahunga,

Aap Mujhe Mile Ya Na Mile Ah Mere Humsafar,
Mar Kar Bhi Aapka Intezaar Karta Hi Rahunga…

st: Mat Intezar Karvao Humse Itna Ki Waqt Ke Faislo Pe Tumhe Bhi Afsos Ho Jay,
s:
Mat Intezar Karvao Humse Itna Ki Waqt Ke Faislo Pe Tumhe Bhi Afsos Ho Jay,
Kya Pta Tum Baat Karne Aye…Aur Tab Tak Humari Ruh Hi Khamosh Ho Jay…

st: Sooni Rahon Mein Soone Patte Pade The
s:
Sooni Rahon Mein Soone Patte Pade The
Shayad Kisi Ke Kadmon Ka Intezaar Tha Unko,
Band Darwazon Kuch Ehsaas Dafan The
Shayad Kisi Sitamgar Ka Intezaar Tha Unko,
Woh Aaye Kuch Is Tarah Se Meri Kabr Pe ,
Jaise Mere Marne Ka Intezaar Tha Unko…

st: Kabhi to hume bhi yaad karoge
s:
Kabhi to hume bhi yaad karoge
Do pal mere liye bhi barbaad karoge
Intezaar rahega hume bhi Qayamat tak
hum bhi to dekhe tu
akhir kab tak hume pyaar na karoge…

st: Na jaane kis shakhs ka intezaar hme aaj bhi hai,
s:
Na jaane kis shakhs ka intezaar hme aaj bhi hai,
Sukoon to bahot hai pr dil bekarar aaj bhi hai,
Tumne hme nafraton k siva kuchh n diya lekin,
Hme tumhare nafraton se pyar aaj bhi hai…

st: Char dino ki chahat mein umar bhar ka intezar hai,
s:
Char dino ki chahat mein umar bhar ka intezar hai,
Mohabbat ek aisi majburi hai jisme sab lachar hain,
Juda nahi kar sakti ab maut bhi mujhe teri yaadon se,
Aur ek zindagi hai jo har pal tere liye beqarar hai…

st: Ae neend zara dhire aa,
s:
Ae neend zara dhire aa,
Lagta hai unke khwabo me ane ka waqt ho gaya hai,
Is pal ke intezar me, suraj dhal gaya hai,
Yahi waqt hai mulakat ka…
Kya btaye yaaro kitna haseen khwab aaya hai,
Shayad ruthe the wo humse, pehli bar kisiko manane me maza aya hai,
Baate to hoti hain magar khwabo me apka iskadar aana kuch naya hai,
Chahe faaslo ne kitni bhi zurrat ki ho darmiyo ki,
Aap kaise bhuloge ki hum apka saya hain…

st: Tere intezaar me ab to neend bhi gumshuda si ho gyi hai
s:
Tere intezaar me ab to neend bhi gumshuda si ho gyi hai
Gar khwab me mulakat kar sko to  main so jau ek lamha…

st: Voh Ankhon ke Samne rehne lga hai aajkal
s:
Voh Ankhon ke Samne rehne lga hai aajkal

Kyun yaad aane lga hai pal pal

Kyun khoyi khoyi si ye Nazar hai
Pyaara Lagne lga yeh lamba safar

Waqt ka Na hosh hai Na darr kisi cheez ka
Rub-a-ru huyi, intezaar tha Jis tasveer ka…

st: Dil ki Naakam Hasratein lekar,
s:
Dil ki Naakam Hasratein lekar,
Hum uska intezar kartey hain,
Kash ke woh Laut aaye mujhse ye kehne,
Tum kon hote ho mujhse Bichadne wale,
Jaise guzra ho abhi tu mere darwaze se,
Ab hawa bhi tere aane ki aahat lagti hai,
Bichad ke tune mujhse kbhi ye bhi socha hai,
Adhoora chand bhi kitna udas lagta hai,
Wohi muntazir Nighaien, wohi Sham-e-Gham ka alam,
Hum azal se dekh rhe hain, Teri wapsi ki raahen…

st: Unka vaada hai ki wo laut k aayenge,
s:
Unka vaada hai ki wo laut k aayenge,
isi ummid par hum jiye jayenge,
ye intejar bhi unki hi tarah pyara hai,
kar rhe the, kar rhe hain aur kiye jayenge…

st: Tere Laut Aane Ka Intezar Karta hun,
s:
Tere Laut Aane Ka Intezar Karta hun,
Dekh Main Tujhse Kitna Pyar Karta hun,
Main Banata Hun Kagaz Pe Teri Tasveer,
Phir Unse Baatein Hazar Karta Hun,
Tere Dukh Bhi Khuloos-e-Niyat Se,
Apne Dukhon Me Shumar Karta Hu,
Sach Samajhta Hu Jhoot Bhi Tera,
Yun Main Tera Aitbar Karta hun,
Abhi Bhi Sochta hu To Aankhein Bheeg Jati hai,
Ae Jaan-e-Jaan Main Tum se Itna Pyar Karta Hun…

st: Zindgi Haseen Hai Zindgi Se Pyar Karo,
s:
Zindgi Haseen Hai Zindgi Se Pyar Karo,
Hai Andhera To Kya,
Ujale Ka Intezar Karo,
Wo Pal Bhi Ayega Jiska Intzar Hai Apko,
Rab Par Bhrosa Or Waqt Par Aitbar Karo…

st: Kab Ek Sham Ko Tumko Dekha Tha
s:
Kab Ek Sham Ko Tumko Dekha Tha
Aur Kab Subah Hui, Kuch Khabar Nahi

Kab Pyar Hua Aur
Kab Hue Badnaam, Kuch Khabar Nahi

Kab Hui Subah Aur
Kab Hui Raat, Kuch Khabar Nahi

Kab Tum Zindagi Ban Gayi
Kab Tum Bani Bandagi, Kuch Khabar Nahi

Kab Tum Bani Bewafa Aur
Kyo Ki Tumne Bewafai, Kuch Khabar Nahi

Kab Se Ker Rahe Hain Intezar
Aur Kab Tak Karenge, Kuch Khabar Nahi

st: Usne Kaha Ab Kiska Intezaar Hai,
s:
Usne Kaha Ab Kiska Intezaar Hai,
Maine Kaha Ab Bhi Mohabbat Baaki Hai,
Usne Kaha Tu Toh Kab Ka Guzar Chuka Hai ‘Masroor’,
Maine Kaha Ab Bhi Mera Hausla Baaki Hai…

st: Aaj Mausam Ko Kya Ho Gaya
s:
Aaj Mausam Ko Kya Ho Gaya
Dost Mera Jaane Kahan Kho Gaya
Hum To Uske MSG Ka Intezaar Karte Reh Gaye
Par Lagta Hai Koi Aur Uske MSG Ka Haqdar Ho Gaya…

st: Jeene Ki Khwaish Me Har Roz Marte Hain
s:
Jeene Ki Khwaish Me Har Roz Marte Hain
Wo Aaye Na Aaye Hum Intezaar Karte Hain
Jutha Hi Sahi Mere Yaar Ka Vaada
Hum Sach Maankar Aitbar Karte Hain…

st: Dil Ye Humara Bekarar Ho Raha Hai
s:
Dil Ye Humara Bekarar Ho Raha Hai
Lagta Hai Hume Aapse Pyar Ho Raha Hai
Aap Aa Jaiye Yahan Jaldi Se
Aapka Besabri Se Intezar Ho Raha Hai…

st: Raat Ka Andhera Subah Mein Badal Gaya
s:
Raat Ka Andhera Subah Mein Badal Gaya
Tera Khwab Khyalon Me Badal Gaya
Ab To Yaad Kar Le Mere Humdard
Tujh Bin Har Pal Sadiyon Me Badal Gaya…

st: Zindagi Ki Sham Dhal Rahi Hai Intezar Mein
s:
Zindagi Ki Sham Dhal Rahi Hai Intezar Mein
Kabhi To Meri Sadaon Ko Sun Paoge Tum
Bekhudi Me Kar Baithe Hain Wada Maut Se
Us Se To Pehle Laut Aaoge Tum…

st: Koi Milta Hi Nahi Humse Humara Bankar
s:
Koi Milta Hi Nahi Humse Humara Bankar
Wo Mile Bhi To Ek Kinara Bankar
Har Khwab Toot Ke Bikhra Kanch Ki Tarah
Bas Ek Intezar Hai Sath, Sahara Bankar…

st: Sochte Hain Ke Tujhse Pyar Kar Lein
s:
Sochte Hain Ke Tujhse Pyar Kar Lein
Apne Pyar Ka Charcha Beshumar Kar Lein
Bas Ek Bar Bana Loon Tere Dil Mein Jagah
Fir Umar Bhar Tere Aane Ka Intezar Kar Lein…

st: Udas Ankhon Mein Sabar Dekha Hai
s:
Udas Ankhon Mein Sabar Dekha Hai
Pehli Bar Use Itna Khush Aur Beqarar Dekha Hai
Jise Khabar Na Hoti Thi Mere Aane Jane Ki
Uski Ankhon Mein Ab Intezar Dekha Hai

st: Maine Khuda Ke Fariste Se Puchha,
s:
Maine Khuda Ke Fariste Se Puchha,
“Keemat Kya Hai Is Duniya Mein Pyar Ki…”
Farista Hass Ke Bola,
“Aansu Bhari Aankhe Aur Ek Puri Umar Intezar Ki…”

st: Kaise Kati Raatein Bata Nahi Sakte
s:
Kaise Kati Raatein Bata Nahi Sakte
Guzra Hua Pal Ginwa Nahi Sakte
Pyar Apna Bhula Nahi Sakte
Bas Tera Hi Intezar Hai
Ab Aa Jao,
Is Dil Ko Aur Tadpa Nahi Sakte

st: Qayamat Tak Tujhe Yaad Karenge
s:
Qayamat Tak Tujhe Yaad Karenge
Teri Har Baat Per Aitbar Karenge
Tujhe SMS Karne Ko To Nahi Kahenge
Per Bhir Bhi Tere SMS Ka Intezar Karenge

st: Koi Pukar Raha Tha Khuli Fazaon Se
s:
Koi Pukar Raha Tha Khuli Fazaon Se
Jise Nigah Mili Usko Intezar Mila

Vo Koi Raah Ka Pathar Ho Ya Hanseen Manzar
Jahan Se Raasta Thehra Vahin Mazaar Mila

Har Ek Saans Na Jaane Thi Justjoo Kiski
Har Ek Ghar Musafir Ko Beghar Mila

Ye Shehar Hai Ki Numaish Lagi Hui Hai Koi
Jo Aadami Bhi Mila Banke Ishtihar Mila

st: Door Ho Jayun To Zara Intezar Karna
s:
Door Ho Jayun To Zara Intezar Karna
Apne Dil Ko Na Yun Bekarar Karna
Laut Kar Aayenge Hum Jahan Bhi Jayenge
Bas Humari Dosti Per Aitbar Karna

st: Raat Se Jee Hai Sogwar Bahut
s:
Raat Se Jee Hai Sogwar Bahut
Yaad Aao Na Aaj Yaar Bahut

Paanv Me Dum Rahe Dyaar Bahut
Haath Chalte Hon, Rozgar Bahut

Dil Me Har Vaqt Ek Hungama
Shehar Tanha Hai Sheharyar Bahut

Dekh Li Meharbaniya Teri
Zindagi Ban Na Ghamgusar Bahut

Kya Koi Yaar Aane Wala Hai
Waqt Pucho Ho, Aaj Yaar Bahut

Raat Kehti Hai Badr So Jao
Ho Chuka Uska Intezar Bahut
